author: dildick
body:
Updated customization file to run: 
- only GEM or GEM+ME0 digitizer
- GEM or GEM+ME0 digitizer on top of Muon digi sequence
- GEM or GEM+ME0 digitizer on top of Full digi sequence

This file is only referenced in SimMuon/GEMDigitizer/test/runGEMDigiProducer_cfg.py.
title: Update customization for GEM+ME0 digitizer
